item.title: Plotting Pokemon Stats
item.description: I made this data visualization earlier this year while studying d3.js. Just got it up and running on the new site. I’m using data from Takamasa Kato on Kaggle. Axes are selectable, and you can hover over a point to see which Pokemon it belongs to. X Axis: Select Y Axis: Select
